item.title: Comics and spandex
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Gutterninja has a great blog entry about comics and the stigma they have over them regarding super heroes. It's the old "comics are just about people in capes right?" argument, stuff I definitely feel strongly about (especially since I currently don't write any super hero stuff). Good stuff. Check out the entry here. (Link courtesy of Grotesque Anatomy)
